div.bibl: Saloniki, Dec. 12, 1931XMAS FETE BY MOTHERS' SOCIETY

body.p: p. 5.- The "Mothers' Society," of Socrates School, next Sunday, will hold a Christmas tree festival with the distribution of presents to poor pupils.
The festival will take place in the auditorium of the Greek-American school, Socrates.

Any of our fellow-Greeks who wish to brighten the affair, by sending presents to be distributed way know that this will be highly appreciated. Their presence also will give more life and vigor to the festival.
